Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    play.test.FakeRequest
    construct a Request using play.mvc.Http.RequestBuilder
    play.libs.ws.WSRequestHolder
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    play.db.ebean.Model
    Use com.avaje.ebean.Model instead.
    play.Plugin
    Use modules instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    play.test.Helpers.charset(Result)
    use Result.charset() instead.
    play.test.Helpers.contentType(Content)
    use Result.contentType() instead.
    play.test.Helpers.contentType(Result)
    use Result.contentType() instead.
    play.test.Helpers.cookie(String, Result)
    use Result.cookie(String) instead.
    play.test.Helpers.cookies(Result)
    use Result.cookies() instead.
    play.test.Helpers.flash(Result)
    use Result.flash() instead.
    play.test.Helpers.header(String, Result)
    use Result.header(String) instead.
    play.test.Helpers.headers(Result)
    use Result.headers() instead.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestBody.isMaxSizeExceeded()
    Since Play 2.4, this method always returns false. When the max size is exceeded, a 413 error is returned
    play.GlobalSettings.onLoadConfig(Configuration, File, ClassLoader)
    This method does not do anything. Instead, specify configuration in your config file or make your own ApplicationLoader (see GuiceApplicationBuilder.loadConfig).
    play.GlobalSettings.onLoadConfig(Configuration, File, ClassLoader, Mode)
    This method does not do anything. Instead, specify configuration in your config file or make your own ApplicationLoader (see GuiceApplicationBuilder.loadConfig).
    play.test.Helpers.redirectLocation(Result)
    use Result.redirectLocation() instead.
    play.test.Helpers.route(Application, Http.RequestBuilder, byte[])
    play.test.Helpers.route(Application, Http.RequestBuilder, byte[], long)
    play.test.Helpers.route(Http.RequestBuilder, byte[])
    play.test.Helpers.route(Http.RequestBuilder, byte[], long)
    play.test.Helpers.session(Result)
    use Result.session() instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Request.setUsername(String)
    As of release 2.4, use Http.Request.withUsername(java.lang.String)
    play.test.Helpers.status(Result)
    use Result.status() instead.
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.withTransactionAsync(F.Function0<F.Promise<T>>)
    This may cause deadlocks
    play.db.jpa.JPA.withTransactionAsync(F.Function0<F.Promise<T>>)
    This may cause deadlocks
    play.db.jpa.JPAApi.withTransactionAsync(F.Function0<F.Promise<T>>)
    This may cause deadlocks
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.withTransactionAsync(String, boolean, F.Function0<F.Promise<T>>)
    This may cause deadlocks
    play.db.jpa.JPA.withTransactionAsync(String, boolean, F.Function0<F.Promise<T>>)
    This may cause deadlocks
    play.db.jpa.JPAApi.withTransactionAsync(String, boolean, F.Function0<F.Promise<T>>)
    This may cause deadlocks
